name: Learn Finnish Free
description: The best app free Learn Finnish for the world, contains over 9000 common Finnish words and phrases with excellent audio quality. It serve the purpose for learning and travelers visiting Finnish...Lessons are divided into category and subcategory in a scientific way, try and feel. It brings a new learning methods  FEATURES  - Support multiple languages (Translate from 32 languages to Finnish) - Quiz game (choose correct answer and rearrange these words to make meaningful sentences) will improve word and phrases - Perfect search and manage your favourite items system - No internet connection required
